Packages 
Package Description
view.beerapp.activities.hardware
Contain activities related to the hardware of the device
view.beerapp.activities.location_drink
Hold all the activities and fragments for displaying drinks and locations
view.beerapp.activities.login
Hold all the activities for displaying everything related to the authentication
view.beerapp.activities.navigation
Hold all the activities and fragments that can be accessed from the navigation drawer
view.beerapp.activities.navigation.newsFeed
Hold all the activities and fragments regarding the news feed
view.beerapp.activities.users
Hold all the activities and fragments regarding users, profile and friends
view.beerapp.contract
Hold all the interface used in the app.
view.beerapp.entities
All classes representing an entity in the app
view.beerapp.repository
All classes used to access the database and repositories
view.beerapp.utility
Hold all utility classes used for different things
